item.title: Kharla add a quote by Dan Brown
item.description: "Science and religion are not at odds. Science is simply too young to understand." -- Dan Brown

item.title: Kharla add a quote by James Patterson
Kharla add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "If conversation was the lyrics, laughter was the music, making time spent together a melody that could be replayed over and over without getting stale." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Kharla add a quote by John Green
item.description: "The only way out of the labyrinth of suffering is to forgive." -- John Green

item.title: Kharla add a quote by John Green
item.description: "What is the point of being alive if you don't at least try to do something remarkable?" -- John Green

item.title: Kharla add a quote by John Green
item.description: "What a slut time is. She screws everybody." -- John Green
